Before using FEEDI, it is recommended to calibrate its built-in BNO055 until all calibration values are 1 or higher.

 Gyroscope:
 The gyroscope can be calibrated by putting the device in a stable position.

 Accelerometer:
 The accelerometer can be calibrated by rotating the device in 45Â° steps around one axis.

 Magnetometer:
 The magnetometer can be calibrated by moving the device around in the tajectory of a figure 8.

 System:
 The system calibration comes along with the other calibrations.

 Source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bw0WuAyGsnY (April 5th, 2019)
